description.value:
A Large Banner or icon that must be carried in one hand or affixed to a sturdy backpack. When held aloft any who are Dedicated to Khorne and can see it can Enter a Frenzy as a Free Action if they have the talent, and gain +10 to WS and BS as long as it remains in their sight.

Requirements

Bearer must be Dedicated to Khorne for it to function. Heretical

Effect: Near Unique

Notes: -
